other.description:
At the start of the battle, if this model is leading a KASTELAN ROBOTS unit, that unit enters Aegis Protocols (see below). In your Command phase, if this model is leading a KASTELAN ROBOTS unit, you can select one protocol from those listed below for that unit to enter. Once a unit enters a protocol, it remains in that protocol until it enters a different one.

* **Protector Protocol**: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by KASTELAN ROBOT models in that unit.
* **Conqueror Protoco**l: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by KASTELAN ROBOT models in that unit.
* **Aegis Protocol**: Add 1 to the Toughness characteristic of KASTELAN ROBOT models in that unit.
other.name: Battle Protocols

leads.extra:
This model must be attached to the following unit: KASTELAN ROBOTS
You must attach this model to a KASTELAN ROBOTS unit, even if one or more other CYBERNETICA DATASMITH models have already been attached to it. In such cases, if that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units with their original Starting Strengths. If you cannot attach this model to a KASTELAN ROBOTS unit, this model cannot be deployed and counts as having been destroyed during the first battle round. While attached to a KASTELAN ROBOTS unit, this model loses the INFANTRY keyword.

datasheets.fluff: Secutarii Hoplites are defensive troops able to endure the most hazardous battlefields thanks to the crackling energy barriers generated by their interlocking Kyropatris field generators. The power of these surgically implanted devices is channelled and amplified by the Hoplitesâ€™ unique shields, which allow them to withstand phenomenal amounts of enemy firepower while striking back with their potent arc lances.

datasheets.fluff: Secutarii Peltasts are specialised Adeptus Mechanicus ground troops principally employed to saturate targets with concentrated firepower from their galvanic casters, neutralising any threats to valuable Mechanicus assets. Like the Skitarii infantry they resemble, Peltasts are adaptable and mobile soldiers, and are often deployed to reach, encircle and defend their mastersâ€™ fallen god-engines.

special.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.
special.name: SUPREME COMMANDER

datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: solar atomiser; arc scourge; Cawlâ€™s Omnissian axe; mechadendrite hive.
datasheets.name: Belisarius Cawl
wargear: None

enhancements.description: Ranged weapons equipped by the bearer have the [ANTI-VEHICLE 4+] ability.
enhancements.name: Arch-Negator

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. The bearer has a Leadership characteristic of 6+ and, once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly CULT MECHANICUS unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of the bearer. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.
enhancements.name: Battle-sphere Uplink

enhancements.description: ADEPTUS MECHANICUS model only. Ranged weapons equipped by the bearer have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 2+] and [ANTI-MONSTER 4+] abilities.
enhancements.name: Autoclavic Denunciation

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. At the end of your Command phase, if the bearer is within range of your Acquisition objective marker, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.
enhancements.name: Magos

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1.
enhancements.name: Mantle Of the Gnosticarch

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. Once per turn, when a friendly LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE model with the Deadly Demise ability that is within 12" of the bearer is destroyed, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, do not roll to determine whether any mortal wounds are inflicted as a result of that modelâ€™s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.
enhancements.name: Emotionless Clarity

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. While the bearer is leading a unit that is within range of your Acquisition objective marker, once per phase, you can change the result of one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one saving throw made for that unit to an unmodified 6.
enhancements.name: Artisan

enhancements.description: ADEPTUS MECHANICUS model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.
enhancements.name: Malphonic Susurrus

enhancements.description: ADEPTUS MECHANICUS model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
enhancements.name: Peerless Eradicator

enhancements.description: Skitarii Marshal model only. After both players have deployed their armies and determined who has the first turn, you can select up to three SKITARII INFANTRY units from your army and redeploy all of those units. When doing so, any of those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.
enhancements.name: Veiled Hunter

enhancements.description: Skitarii model only. In your Shooting phase, after the bearerâ€™s unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that unit can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, that unit is not eligible to declare a charge.
enhancements.name: Battle-sphere Uplink

enhancements.description: Skitarii model only. The bearer, and models in any unit they are leading, have the Infiltrators and Scouts 6" abilities.
enhancements.name: Clandestine Infiltrator

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. Once per battle, at the start of your Command phase, you can select the Benediction of the Omnissiah you did not select at the start of the first battle round. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Benediction of the Omnissiah is active for the bearerâ€™s unit in addition to the one that is currently active for your army.
enhancements.name: Data-blessed Autosermon

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. Once per turn, at the start of your opponentâ€™s Shooting phase, select one enemy VEHICLE unit within 12" of and visible to the bearer. That unit must take a Leadership test: if that test is passed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll; if that test is failed, that unit is not eligible to shoot this phase.
enhancements.name: Lord of Machines

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of your Acquisition objective marker, add 1 to the Hit roll.
enhancements.name: Logis

enhancements.description: ADEPTUS MECHANICUS model only. From the second battle round onwards, when resolving the Fallout effect of the Rad-bombardment Detachment rule, if the bearer is on the battlefield, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of your opponentâ€™s deployment zone, in addition to those that are within your opponentâ€™s deployment zone.
enhancements.name: Radial Suffusion

enhancements.description: Skitarii Marshal model only. At the start of the battle round, you can select one friendly SKITARII unit within 12" of the bearer. Until the start of the next battle round, the Protector Imperative and the Conqueror Imperative are both active for that unit.
enhancements.name: Cantic Thrallnet

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. Once per battle round, when a saving throw made for a friendly LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE model within 12" of the bearer is failed, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If they do, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.
enhancements.name: Necromechanic

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. The bearerâ€™s unit has the Fights First ability
enhancements.name: Temporcopia

enhancements.description: Tech Priest model only. While the bearer is leading a unit that is within range of your Acquisition objective marker, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.
enhancements.name: Genetor

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back and you can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).
stratagems.fluff: Let the unenlightened be cast down! Let all feel the fire of the Motive Force, and may the sacred engines crunch over their weak bones without impediment!
stratagems.name: MACHINE SUPERIORITY
stratagems.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.

stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 3" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit and add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for it.
stratagems.fluff: Intensifying the locomotive protocols of a war engine - while not dishonouring its machine spirit - is a millennia-proven method to hasten the foeâ€™s demise.
stratagems.name: MOTIVE IMPERATIVE
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.

stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.
stratagems.fluff: To invigorate the failing machine spirit of a damaged vehicle is a sacred task, greatly aided by certain data-hymns transmitted in the correct sequence.
stratagems.name: MACHINE SPIRIT RESURGENT
stratagems.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.

stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, which is improved to Feel No Pain 5+ against mortal wounds.
stratagems.fluff: A protective blessing chanted in pentakairic Novabyte moves machine spirits to defy the most esoteric of assaults.
stratagems.name: BENEVOLENCE OF THE OMNISSIAH
stratagems.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.

stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have a Ballistic Skill characteristic of 3+ and the [IGNORES COVER] ability, but they can only target units within range of the selected objective marker.
stratagems.fluff: Encoded with the schemata of the enemy's fortified battle lines and auto-codified vectors of attack, the Cohort's war engines are perfectly aligned to deliver the Machine God's wrath.
stratagems.name: AUTO-DIVINATORY TARGETING
stratagems.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army, and one objective marker.

stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, the Conqueror Imperative and Protector Imperative are both active for your unit.
stratagems.fluff: Enhanced static chants can briefly raise a war engine's machine spirits to exultant heights of cogitation and multi-tactical capacity.
stratagems.name: TRANSCENDENT COGITATION
stratagems.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.

stratagems.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of one or more CULT MECHANICUS models in your unit, adding 1 to the result if that model is an ELECTRO-PRIEST. On a 5+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
stratagems.fluff: Summoning the spark of the Machine God's divinity that burns within them, the Omnissiahâ€™s faithful manifest blazing auras of energy that lay low the unbeliever.
stratagems.name: LITANY OF THE ELECTROMANCER
stratagems.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army.

stratagems.effect: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that test is failed, until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.fluff: A cacophonous chorale pours from the emitters and augmented throats of the Cult Mechanicusâ€™ faithful, venerating the Omnissiah in deafening and disconcerting frequencies of praise.
stratagems.name: TRIBUTE OF EMPHATIC VENERATION
stratagems.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army and one enemy unit within 18" of it.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, CULT MECHANICUS models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.fluff: As the cohorts of the Omnissiah recite their dazzling consecration, energy is redirected to infuse masterwork bionics and even the lambent glow of protective fields ignites in a halo of divine defence.
stratagems.name: LUMINESCENT BLESSING
stratagems.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unitâ€™s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponentâ€™s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, CULT MECHANICUS models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.
stratagems.fluff: Raising their voices in binharic praise, the Machine God's disciples bolster their spirits - as well as those that inhabit their augmentations - with iron surety.
stratagems.name: INCANTATION OF THE IRON SOUL
stratagems.target: That CULT MECHANICUS modelâ€™s unit.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after you allocate a mortal wound to a CULT MECHANICUS model from your army.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a CULT MECHANICUS model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking modelâ€™s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.fluff: Rousing code in binharic duometer incites fury for the lost fragments of technological lore. In the grip of vengeance, the devoted extend their remaining functions for one last act of retribution.
stratagems.name: VERSE OF VENGEANCE
stratagems.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unitâ€™s attacks.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a CULT MECHANICUS model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.fluff: In spitting out a staccato chant to the Motive Force, the faithful warriors of the Cult Mechanicus are filled with merciless surety as well as intent.
stratagems.name: CHANT OF THE REMORSELESS FIST
stratagems.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.

stratagems.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.
stratagems.fluff: Death is irrelevant compared to the hallowed duty of securing the Omnissiah's knowledge for future retrieval.
stratagems.name: CACHED ACQUISITION
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, both of those units have the Stealth ability and the Benefit of Cover.
stratagems.fluff: The machine spirits of sanctified war engines can be entreated to release clouds of incense laced with radioactive particles, veiling the faithful from the foe.
stratagems.name: INCENSE EXHAUSTS
stratagems.target:
One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY unit
    from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unitâ€™s attacks, and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS SMOKE unit within 6" of it.
stratagems.when: Your opponentâ€™s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move within range of your Acquisition objective marker.
stratagems.fluff: Retrieval of the most sacred and ancient fragments of technology is embedded in loops of alpha-logic.
stratagems.name: PRIORITY RECLAMATION
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot target a unit with this Stratagem if it is within 3" of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army Consolidates.

stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, that objective marker is also considered to be one of your Acquisition objective markers for all rules purposes.
stratagems.fluff: Mono-task infoslave skulls range ahead to assess potential sites that must be investigated.
stratagems.name: INFOSLAVE SKULL
stratagems.target: One TECH-PRIEST model from your army and one objective marker within 24" of that model (excluding your Acquisition objective marker].

stratagems.effect: Your unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.
stratagems.fluff: Holy data must be hoarded at all costs, and thickly armoured war engines offer swift and secure vaults.
stratagems.name: REACTIVE SAFEGUARD
stratagems.restrictions: Every model in your unit must be within 3" of that TRANSPORT and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.
stratagems.target:
One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY
    unit from your army within range of your Acquisition objective marker that was selected as a target of that charge, and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS TRANSPORT.
stratagems.when: Your opponentâ€™s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.

stratagems.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within range of that objective marker. On a 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound and it must take a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.fluff: As Tech-Priests order the purge of an area of the battlefield, rad-bombardments are redoubled in the hopes of turning it into a wasteland.
stratagems.name: EXTINCTION ORDER
stratagems.target: One TECH-PRIEST model from your army and one objective marker within 24" of that model.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes a ranged attack, if the target of that attack is within your opponentâ€™s deployment zone, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
stratagems.fluff: Employing targeting data collated by a swarm of servo-skulls released over the enemy's battle lines, the Machine Godâ€™s faithful purge the foe stumbling amidst rad-scourged positions.
stratagems.name: PRE-CALIBRATED PURGE SOLUTION
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time one of those units Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.
stratagems.fluff: The Skitarii feel the press of an invisible hand upon their minds as the Machine God drives them forward. Servos are pushed to their structural limits as fibre bundles fill with the boundless energy of the Motive Force and propel the faithful on an unstoppable crusade.
stratagems.name: AGGRESSOR IMPERATIVE
stratagems.target: One SKITARII unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.

stratagems.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.fluff: Taking direct control of their cybernetic soldiersâ€™ manoeuvres, the cohortâ€™s commander sees their withdrawal carried out with such precision that they can be pressed back into service from the most efficacious of attack vectors.
stratagems.name: PROGRAMMED WITHDRAWAL
stratagems.restrictions: Each unit targeted with this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.
stratagems.target: Up to two SICARIAN units from your army, or one SKITARII INFANTRY or SKITARII MOUNTED unit from your army.
stratagems.when: End of your opponentâ€™s Fight phase.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if there are no other enemy units within 6" of the unit targeted by that attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.fluff: The swiftest hunters seek to engage foes with the equations of war in their favour, isolating their quarry and dispatching it with ruthless efficiency.
stratagems.name: ISOLATE AND DESTROY
stratagems.target:
One SICARIAN, PTERAXII, SYDONIAN,
    IRONSTRIDER BALLISTARII Or SKITARII MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
stratagems.fluff: Between their multi-layered bionics and their fanatical faith in the indomitability of these machine-blessings, the most augmented of Skitarii are nigh-impossible to lay low.
stratagems.name: BIONIC ENDURANCE
stratagems.target: One SICARIAN, PTERAXII or SYDONIAN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unitâ€™s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponentâ€™s Shooting phase orthe Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".
stratagems.fluff: When Skitarii Hunter Cohorts march to war, they do so beneath a shrouding squall of cyber-static and filament-heavy banks of sacred incense.
stratagems.name: SHROUD PROTOCOLS
stratagems.target: One SKITARII INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unitâ€™s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponentâ€™s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.fluff: Employing directed binharic entanglement to coordinate their motions, paired squads of Skitarii attack with eerie and lethal synchronicity.
stratagems.name: EXPEDITED PURGE PROTOCOL
stratagems.target: One SKITARII unit from your army.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of your Acquisition objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.fluff: With a surge of targeting data from the war engine as its hatches slam open, the warriors inside pour out with weapons already trained unerringly on the foe.
stratagems.name: AUTO-ORACULAR RETRIEVAL
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in those units from your army have a 4+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.fluff: With a pulse of force-loaded wisdom, microactuators lock into bracing positions, reserve power cells are brought online and the Omnissiah's holy crusaders are bestowed with a sensation of sacred invulnerability.
stratagems.name: BULWARK IMPERATIVE
stratagems.target: One SKITARII unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unitâ€™s attacks. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
stratagems.when: Your opponentâ€™s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
stratagems.fluff: Tri-fold sanctified power cells, fue l canisters and solid slugs have spent a decade in the most irradiated forge temple to certify their lethality.
stratagems.name: LETHAL DOSAGE
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is made that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.fluff: By briefly unshielding the most corrosive or irradiated components of their being, the warriors of a Rad-Zone Corps can exhale on isotopic fog, sapping the strength of those not inured to its effects.
stratagems.name: BALEFUL HALO
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army (excluding VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unitâ€™s attacks. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in both of your units by 1.
stratagems.fluff: Employing directed binharic entanglement to coordinate their motions, paired squads of Skitarii attack with eerie and lethal synchronicity.
stratagems.name: BBINHARIC OFFENCE
stratagems.restrictions: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target].
stratagems.target: Two SKITARII units from your army that have not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit.
stratagems.when: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
